author: radup
msg: Updated to a new, current (as of Jan 25 2006) version of XMLSchema.xsd to fix problem with final attribute on simpleType not accepting a list of valid members.

author: ammulder
msg: Update namespaces, remove parentIds, and improve RAR file paths
for the DB & security realm portlets (GERONIMO-1450)

author: craigmcc
msg: The Shale Tiger Extensions now support the ability for JSF components,
converters, renderers, and validators to register themselves with the
JSF runtime, without having to be declared in a faces-config.xml file.
Thanks to Gary vanMatre for the suggestion to do this.

author: craigmcc
msg: Ensure that the instance returned by RenderKitFactory.getRenderKit() is the
same as the instance in the renderKit variable.
Improve the exception messages on component lookups that fail.

author: sebor
msg: for callers to control whether to escape non-printable characters
respectively, the use of escape sequences when formatting narrow
and wide characters using the %c, %{c}, %lc, and %{lc} directives.
